translations: 斋戒；节制饮食（fast 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 夏令时间；日光节约时间（daylight-saving time）

sentences.sentence: A set period of fasting is supposed to bring us closer to godliness.
sentences.translation: 通常认为一段固定的斋戒期可以使我们更虔诚。

sentences.sentence: On the other hand, they burned slightly more calories, on average, during the workout after breakfast than after fasting.
sentences.translation: 另一方面，在早餐后的锻炼过程中，他们平均消耗的热量比空腹后略多。

sentences.sentence: Next year, I might even double the amount of time I spend fasting.
sentences.translation: 明年，我甚至可能把我禁食的时间增加一倍。
